description: Dashboard is showing state and configuration for Redis cluster

panels.description: Indicate the master is syncing to the replica

panels.description: Number of seconds since the last interaction with master
panels.title: Master last IO seconds

panels.description: Flag indicating replication backlog is active
panels.title: Backlog is active

panels.description: Total size in bytes of the replication backlog buffer
panels.title: Backlog size

panels.title: Backlog history size

panels.description: The master offset of the replication backlog buffer
panels.title: Master backlog offset
